TITLE: "NSE Imposes Fine of Rs 1.67 Crore on Angel One, Bans From Onboarding New Authorised Persons for 6 Months; Shares Slump 7%"
DESCRIPTION: Authorised person means any -- individual, partnership firm OR LLP -- who is appointed as such by a stockbroker and who provides access to the trading platform of a stock exchange as an agent of the stockbroker, as per the exchanges' websites.
